description: The AWS::Macie::Session resource specifies a new Amazon Macie session. A session is an object that represents the Amazon Macie service. A session is required for Amazon Macie to become operational.

Status.description: A enumeration value that specifies the status of the Macie Session.

FindingPublishingFrequency.description: A enumeration value that specifies how frequently finding updates are published.

CreatedAt.description: Date-time at which the custom data identifier was created.

UpdatedAt.description: Date-time at which the custom data identifier was last updated.
